text: aṉṟiyum evarkaḷ taṅkaḷai, "niccayamāka nāṅkaḷ kiṟistavarkaḷ" eṉṟu kūṟikkoḷkiṟārkaḷō avarkaḷiṭamiruntum nām uṟutimoḻi vāṅkiṉōm;. Āṉāl avarkaḷum avarkaḷukku vaḻaṅkappaṭṭirunta pōtaṉaiyiṉ (perum) pakutiyai maṟantu viṭṭārkaḷ;. Ākavē, iṟuti nāḷ varai avarkaḷiṭaiyē pakaimaiyum, veṟuppum nilaikkac ceytōm;. Iṉṉum, avarkaḷ ceytu koṇṭiruntavai paṟṟi allāh avarkaḷukku eṭuttuk kāṭṭuvāṉ
